question.title: Using both @Select in java and Select in xml file in mybatis
question.body:
I was originally using @Select in my interface for my sql queries in the interface file and have added @MapperScan above my SpringApplication class.
But my sql query is now huge and I am getting "<script>SELECT ..." is too long for constant pool
After which I tried to move the query to xml file but when I do that I get Invalid bound statement (not found) .
I tried adding mybatis.mapper-locations in my applications.properties but still getting the same error.
I now have my SQL queries in both Java file and XML file and want to use both for mapping.
Does anyone know how to solve it?
